location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 575 x 483mm, on sheet, 631 x 497mm

mods.abstract: This map shows Gallipoli Peninsula in the southern part of East Thrace, the European part of Turkey, indicating roads and rivers. The map also indicates relief with contours.The map includes a printing statement which reads '(B 16480) WT 18370-212.5050.10/20.H&S,LTD.'This map was produced by the War Office.
